In this task, on each screen you will see several numbers that make up a series. There will be one or more empty spaces somewhere in the series. Sometimes an empty space will be at the end of the series, sometimes in the middle, and sometimes at the beginning. Please press the number buttons to enter the number that goes in each empty space. The answer will be a number between 0 and 99.
